post:
Hello,
I hope you are all having a nice day, here are 2 very nice KVM Cloud Offers using the SolusVM control Panel. These plans are all on the east coast of the united states. The server runs a dual x5650 with is a total of 24 cores including hyper thread. All VPS are using Pure SSD Hard Drives making your system run fast. -Free Custom OS Installation (User Provides OS)--OS are installed AFTER order in your control panel- Contact us from our client area for support.

**KVM Special 1 - 2GB** **- $5/Mo ($3.8/Mo with Annual Billing)**

-2GB RAM

-2 cores

-8GB Pure SSD

-100 Mbps Port

-1000GB Bandwidth

-KVM Virtualization (Full Virtualization)

-SolusVM Powered

-Free Custom OS Installation

-No Software Support

[ORDER NOW](https://client.chairhosting.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=116)




NOTE: Install your OS after order in your control panel, the server does not have any OS by default.

Extra IPv4: 1 Included, Up to 3 available, contact us for more

IPv6: Contact Us

Please shared your experience if you order.

Thanks

Chair Hosting
